data.title: COZY POWELL DISCOGRAPHY
data.text:
COZY POWELL (UK) DISCOGRAPHY

Presented by Joe Geesin. If you have any questions about the information on this page, please feel free to e-mail Joe at [email protected]

Discography is UK only, unless either unreleased in UK or significantly different. Many Rainbow / Whitesnake singles released similarly in Japan. Many CP solo singles feature different European artwork. Too many foreign Rainbow / Whitesnake non UK compilations to list, and most standard LPs only differ by catalogue number.
